meanings.sent1: The aluminous foil wrapped around the sandwich kept it fresh.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen utensils were made of aluminous material.
meanings.sent3: The aluminous pots and pans sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and aluminous as a polished aluminum surface.
meanings.sent5: The aluminous appearance of the building made it stand out among the others.

meanings.sent1: The aluminous car gleamed under the streetlights.
meanings.sent2: The lake had an aluminous sheen in the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The aluminous balloons shimmered at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were aluminous, reflecting the excitement of the moment.
meanings.sent5: The aluminous surface of the mirror made her reflection crystal clear.
